body: Beautifully packaged ordered Sunday delivery following Tuesday. Lovely full plant with many buds. Had roses from here before they are definitely ahead of any others. Worth every penny. ❤️

title: The Kings Rose Quality
body: Just received The Kings Rose 2 days after its release, its beyond beautiful. Such a stunning flower, arrived in pristine condition. Gladens the heart. So happy with it.

title: Gorgeous
body: Just received my rose it was well packed and in fantastic condition. It’s full of buds

title: Beautiful rose
body:
The King’s  Rose is beautiful. It was delivered quickly, well packaged and a good strong plant with lots of buds! Wonderful scent too.
Ordered it after seeing it on the Chelsea Flower show and it will be in memory of two very special people we have lost in past few weeks.
Thank you

title: Beautiful Gift
body: My grandmother bought me this rose as she knows I'm a huge fan of David Austin. It arrived in brilliant timing and the condition of the rose is superb, which is the main reason why I only buy my roses direct. With several buds already waiting to bloom, I'm looking forward to enjoying this in my garden.

title: Delighted!
body: I was thrilled to receive my rose in full bud, and looking surprisingly tall and healthy. It came within two days. Great service and quality as always from David Austin

title: King Charles Rose
body: Gorgeous striped rose arrived along with an Olivia rose both in bloom and with buds ready to open.  Very well packaged and arrived in 5 days.  Thrilled to bits with them both.  Thank you.

title: Proud Owner
body: I had the absolute pleasure in having Boscobel , Emma Bridgewater and Gertrude Jekyll thrive in my garden all potted in a 2m height planters. I have never tried growing them and with David Austin it’s been a full filling journey. .  I use the soil rich with nutrients and the Mycorrhizal Fungi. You will be thrilled to see some outstanding blooms decorating your garden.

title: Somewhat disappointed
body:
Our rose arrived well packaged and on time however it does not look like a specially handpicked item.
The rose is loose in the pot and waggles easily so is very unstable, we would certainly not have picked it in a shop, the stem is not good or neat.
We also did not expect to have to dead-head a new rose, lots needed and no petals in the box so it must have been packaged in that condition.

Definitely expected better.

title: A King in Sheeps Clothing? Rose not like picture
body: Our rose arrived arrived safely today. It looks beautiful and has lots of buds - looks very healthy. It has the King's Rose label on it, but the actual rose looks rather different - more like the Emma Bridgewater rose. It's a lovely rose but not what I was expecting...

title: Gorgeous
body: I was lucky enough to order before The King’s Rose sold out. It certainly has not disappointed. Totally different from my other roses. Well done to all concerned.

title: Elaine
body:
The King’s Rose is beautiful. It makes me smile every time I look at it. I received a rose bush in excellent health with lots of buds. Looking forward to seeing the flowers emerge over summer. 
Stunning rose.
Beautiful roses. Quick delivery.

title: The King’s Rose
body: The King’s Rose arrived well packaged but somewhat tired.  I was disappointed with the condition of the shrub as shown in the photos.  After much ‘tidying’ it has been planted in a pot and is showing several buds.  We eagerly await the blooms.

title: Stunning rose
body: A beautiful rose, great size, packaged brilliantly. Full of flowers and unopened buds. Looking gorgeous!

title: Eustacia Vye
body: I recently ordered Eustacia Vye rose, which came promptly and in very good condition. It is the most beautiful rose I have ever seen, and smells gorgeous. It has plentiful blooms of peachy pink and looks delightful on my patio. It appears very healthy aswell, so thank you so much David Austin roses.

title: kings Roses
body: Love the new rose looks great in my garden

title: King’s Rose -
body:
Hi 
The rose is beautiful, just pondering on where to plant it!  It has been well received by many friends and family.   Thank you for all your hard work and dedication. 
It was a pleasure to meet David Austin members at Chelsea. Beautiful stand, fell in love with Lady of Shallot and bought that too at my local garden centre.  
Many thanks. Judi West

title: Wonderful fragrant rose
body: The rose has a wonderful perfume that is really quite strong. This means it wafts as you pass the plant. The flowers are all different so each one has an individual beauty.
Came in excellent condition. Very surprised and delighted by size of plant with 6 flowers and between 30-40 buds! Thankyou. A delightful birthday present!

title: Kings Rose
body: A beautiful rose which arrived in first class condition...As always DA you have produced an outstanding rose Well done

title: Beautiful
body: I saw this at the Chelsea Flower Show and decided to buy - it’s so lovely, I’m delighted with my purchase. It is David Austin’s usual high standard plant. I always buy from them and have never been disappointed

title: Beautiful
body: The rose is perfect, it was a lot of money for me to spend but 😞 think it's well worth it
Divine, scent amazing

title: The Kings Rose
body:
I ordered and payed for 3 Kings  Roses at the Chelsea Flower Show because I was gifting one to my daughter.
My two Roses were perfect but my daughters had Black spot and crispy brown leaves, plus she purchased a climber ?   for herself which was also marked.
Because these were delivered to her address and email I told her to contact David Austin which she did and was told it was alright to just remove the damage and everything would be fine, which I don’t think is good enough because I wouldn’t of bought them like that in a shop.
Also on David Austin video it mentioned that the Kings Rose was disease resistant.

I have bought dozens of David Austin Roses over that last 3 yrs and feel really disappointed with the comment, which makes me think should I really carry on buying from them.

title: KINGS ROSE
body:
COMPLETELY DISAPOINTED WITH THIS ROSE.
LONG TWIGGY APPEARANCE 
BRANCHES BROKEN OFF AS SOON AS THE WIND BLEW
FOLLOWED BY PETALS EVEN THOUGH IN SHELTERED GARDEN.
I DO NOT RECOMMEND IT AT ALL.
The plant looks healthy either way buds so I am looking forward to seeing it flower
Well packaged, healthy plant, good planting instructions.
Excellent service , quick delivery and its a stunning healthy rose.

title: My Rose
body: The bush is still in bulb stage so not sure of the final product.  Very impressed how well packed and shipped the rose was.  Fingers crossed I will be happy in due course.
Fantastic rose brought as a gift. Taken pride of place in the garden.

title: Unusual and very similar to old rose
body: I already have Ferdinand Pitchard so took to the King’s Rose immediately. The bees adore the open pollen heart.

title: Gorgeous new rose
body: I’m delighted with my new rose - gorgeous colouring and delicate scent 😊
Lovely rose and delivered on time. Thank you

title: The bees adore it!
body: Beautifully scented rose that the bees haven’t left alone. The rose came well packaged as always from David Austin … and with a couple of flowers open and a mass of buds, it’s been in flower since I planted it. It’s sits beautifully in my cottage garden among the foxgloves and close to Gertrude Jeykll, Emma Bridgewater and The Generous Gardener roses. It’s a beauty! Highly recommend for the colour and scent and as I say, the bees adore it.

title: Stunning new rose
body: Stunning rose and a great addition to my DA collection.  Arrived healthy and well packaged. Highly recommend. It is positioned near my Gertrude Jekyll which compliments the pink. Heavenly scent and nice open flower which keeps the bees busy.

title: Beautiful Rose
body:
Arrived in excellent condition and full of buds 
the roses are beautiful, so pleased I ordered before it sold out . 
Highly recommend

title: Beautiful Rose
body: The King’s Rose like all the David Austin roses I’ve ordered arrived quickly and perfectly packaged. It looked healthy and was bursting with buds. It looks happy sitting in my rose border even though we’ve had heavy rain and high winds lately. I’m really pleased with my purchase it’s such a pretty rose.

title: The King's Rose
body:
All three received in excellent condition.
All healthy and well packaged.
Rose was very well packaged, appears healthy with plenty of buds near to blooming.

title: Lovely Rose
body:
Our rise arrived well packaged and has flourished in a southwest facing border. 
It’s now covered in flowers, smelly gorgeous and the bees love it. 
Very impressed.
Beautiful rose - delivery boxes were a bit battered - but the plants are thriving now.
Beautiful rose

title: Kings Rose
body:
Just received today, strong in bud plant, can’t wait to plant and watch it flourish 
Quick serve thank you  😊

title: Beautiful
body: I received my Rose yesterday, in 3 working days of ordering. In excellent condition, full of buds with one beautiful bloom already open. Absolutely delighted!

title: The scent is gorgeous!
body: As a lover of old fashioned roses and living in a period property, I try to buy appropriate roses which look right in the garden. This arrived today full of flowers and smells totally wonderful! The added bonus is that it’s going to be a repeat flowerer. Looking forward to planting it in one of the borders.

title: Beautiful Rose
body: Arrived within 3 days even though Chelsea is on. Loads of blooms coming.  In the conservatory at the moment prior to planting out, lovely perfume.

title: Fantastic
body: I have just received my The King’s Rose and it is totally fantastic, it has 3 blooms and numerous buds in a variety of stages. The rose arrived in perfect condition and I totally love it, will buy with confidence again!

title: Beautiful Rose
body: I have just received my ‘King’sRose’ and am absolutely delighted. It really is spectacular, it has two full blooms and several buds at varying stages.  I can’t wait to get it planted out in one of my borders.

title: Wow!
body:
Just received my 'Kings rose' this morning. Amazing fast delivery and packaged perfectly to arrive in top condition.
The bush is absolutely stunning, masses of buds from flowering to just forming. It's my first David Austin rose but doubt my last. 
5 star all round!

title: Absolutely exquisite and wonderful in every way - what a joy!
body: Thank you. I couldn’t be happier to have one of these exquisite roses grown  for King Charles. Such refinement. Mixed in a broad border with other David Austin pink and cream roses it creates a magical carpet of perfection

title: Looks like a paintbrush has been at work
body: I received this rose today and couldn’t wait to open it. The delivery man had seen it on TV as I had, we both agreed how stunning it is. My daughter wants one and will have to wait for new stock!  Well done David Austin roses in bringing joy into my garden.

title: Beautiful Rose!
body: I bought three of the king's rose from the mainstore on release day and I couldn't be happier with it as a rose. I'm impressed that david austin has produced such a beautiful striking rose this year.  I was looking for more bee friendly roses and this struck the note that I was after.

title: Such a beautiful rose
body:
Received our rose today , expertly packed arriving in pristine condition .
The colour is stunning , love the mix of cream & pink & has masses of buds , it now has pride of place on the patio.
We didn’t make it to Chelsea this year , but we now have our rose to remind us of Chelsea 2025.

title: The King's Rose
body:
My rose arrived today after only three days from ordering. Packaged very well. It is very healthy with blooms already open and lots more buds to come. 
Now planted in the border where I am sure it will be very happy.
location: Newark on Trent, England, United Kingdom

title: The King’s Rose
body: I wasn’t sure at first, the simplicity of the petal structure and count didn’t captivate me like others and I already have multi colour roses in my garden but in person this rose is so pretty and perfect for my boarder colour scheme. The flowers are sweet and has a matching light delicate scent. I’m really happy with mine and so glad I ordered when I did. It arrived well packed in great condition.

title: The Wonderful Kings Rose
body: Amazing service from David Austin to receive this rose so quickly. Ordered watching Chelsea on TV! This rose makes me feel so happy like seaside rock with a beautiful fragrance, it's truly stunning lots of buds to come on an already tall plant and the bees are loving it. Will give me years of pleasure!

title: The Kings Rose
body:
Arrived in lovely condition.
Planted it out in a big tub.
Bees 🐝 loving it too & lovely smell. 
Thank you David Austin

title: Beautiful Rose - Arrived with Black Spot
body:
BEAUTIFUL Rose. 
For the Price and Prestigue of this rose, it’s a shame it arrived riddled with black spot.Now what I expect!

title: Wonderful
body:
So many buds coming through,  super happy with my choice. Smells divine!  A great new home gift.

Even a bee went straight onto the flower
Thank you for the great packaging and delivery.

title: PERFECTLY SPLENDID
body: so excited i managed to get one not disappointed smells divine I need to find a spot though in my garden.

title: Gorgeous
body:
Really pleased with the Kings Rose 
Arrived in excellent condition with loads of buds and some flowers. The bees 🐝 were straight in there.
Already planted near to Darcey Bussell and looking fabulous 
Thank-you David Austin

title: So Unusual & Eye-catching
body: I ordered the King’s Rose as soon as I received the early sign-up email from DA. I only buy pollinator friendly roses and plants now. This rose is currently in my blue and pink border. It is stunning. The scent is light but the flowers themselves are truly magical. I now have 5 DA roses… Eustacia Vye, Scarborough Fair, Tottering-by-Gently,  Kew Gardens and of course the King’ Rose. So pleased I got this new rose as it has sold out so quickly!

title: Beautiful
body: I really wasn’t sure at first when I ordered the Kings Rose - but thought David Austin knows what they are doing. They truly do - it looks spectacular in my mixed border, and smells wonderful. I am so glad I ordered it so quickly, but am sad I am going to have to wait to order more!
Absolutely stunning rose.. packed really well . The perfume is stunning.

title: Disappointed
body:
I was so excited to receive the new King’s rose but to my disappointment the condition it arrived in left me quite disappointed.
The leaves didn’t look luscious ans if they turning yellow and lost their deep green and had holes in them. One of them didn’t look very healthy either.
I’ve also emailed David Austin regarding care help for other roses I’ve planted and I’ve still not heard back.

title: The Kings Rose
body:
We ordered this and it  arrived very quickly,  we are absolutely delighted with this potted rose the colour and musky fragrance  is beautiful.
Its in a large pot  near our garden  room so when we’re outside we can enjoy it

title: Lovely rose
body: I saw this at the Chelsea Flower Show and had to have it so ordered it while at the show. It arrived yesterday and looks lovely. It already has a few buds on it and looks lovely in the flower bed along from Elizabeth.

title: Beautiful.
body:
We absolutely love this beautiful King's Rose which has been planted in our communal garden in centre London. It shines out with its incredible colour and the Bees love it too.
What more could you wish for! Thank you.

A really beautiful rose and smells amazing. 
Thank you

title: The King Rose
body:
This most spectacular rose is unique. The  colour of the petals just beautiful. With a heavenly scent. 
His Royal Highness must be delighted.

title: The King's Rose bought at Chelsea Flower Show
body: The magnificent rose was delivered within a week from seeing it at the Chelsea Flower Show.  The rose was in a splendid condition and, to my delight, the perfume was much stronger than I had expected.  This rose is exceptional in its stunning colours and fragrance.  David Austin; you should rightfully be proud of yourselves for developing such a handsome specimen.

title: Long live the King
body:
I have always loved Rosa. Mundi  but ir flowers for such a short time 
I look forward to to enjoying this special mew Ros for some more weeks
Well done!!!

title: Kings Rose
body: A beautiful rose and perfect specimen

title: What a gorgeous rose
body: The King’s rose arrived very well packaged a nd was in excellent condition with flowers and buds. The smell is wonderful and it looks amazing in the pot I bought. I bought it to commemorate a loss and I see it every day and smell it and it brings me joy. It came with lots of very useful planting instructions and the website is full of extra information.

title: The Kings rose🌹
body:
They arrived so well packaged in perfect condition 
They are covered in buds can’t wait for them to open 
Excellently grown

title: Another beautiful rose from David Austin
body: Arrived in a healthy condition with lots of buds; we are very happy with our roses and the customer service from David Austin.

title: Great delivery
body: Superbly packaged and delivered and lovely looking plant. No flowers yet but hoping for one soon! Thank you
The rose was in excellent shape.  I planted it straight away.  There lots of buds and it looks healthy and happy

title: Beautiful Inspiration
body: Ordered the 'kings Rose' after seeing in on the Sunday preview show about Chelsea. Arrived in schedule and is now flowering in my garden. Have many Roses from David Austin the quality of them is always 5 star. Thank you to the team for your dedication to your work.

title: Quality
body: Arrivied in quality packaging. The plant was well established and in quality condition. Thank you
It’s beautiful and now has a prime position in my garden. Thankyou

title: Beautiful rose
body: Lovely healthy plant

title: Kings rose
body: Very pleased with the service delivered on time and the rose is top quality so well done to David Austin,would definitely be using again.

title: Gorgeous
body: Excellent quality and speedy delivery
I'm delighted with the plant ! I haven't planted it yet . I'm sure it's  going to be wonderful.

title: There is nothing quite like David's rosé
body:
I would say there are many gardener's like me we experiment with one of natures most amazing plant the rose 
Over the years I worry about what rose would suite in a particular corner or what rose  could stand a little shade and of course there is no need to worry as Mr David had taken all the concern away 
He really did followed on by his close family.
I had the pleasure of speaking to his son a while back a more pleasant man I have yet to meet  
His knowledge is not only first class but world class 
With my best regards Howell

title: Kings Rose a winner
body:
I am thrilled with The Kings Rose. It arrived looking very healthy and covered in buds. It came two days after its debut on the first day at Chelsea and is still blooming. Three bees found the opened flowers within  ten minutes of unwrapping.
It has survived strong winds and torrential rain in an exposed position by the porch. A variegated stunner to add to my collection.

title: Second rose flowering pale yellow and pink
body: The plant looked great The first flower came out pink and while but second pale yellow and pink 🤔
Gorgeous
Beautiful rose . Very well packaged .
Arrived extremely well package
Its beautiful and flowering ❤️fast delivery too
Beautiful. Both roses were in great condition and are growing well
Fab
The smell is inmense and such a beautiful flower
Perfect- came very well packed and a good size- perfection- gorgeous scent
At present, the rose doesn’t look very happy. I am hoping that will change.
Stunning healthy and beautiful

Why would you go anywhere else for roses , than the top 

Saw the kings rose at the Chelsea flower show so preorder this immediately x 

It didn’t disappoint
Just beautiful, perfect quality.
Well packed. Arrived quickly
Beautiful rose. Beautiful scent. It looks lively in our garden. We're looking forward to the next flush of blooms.

title: Doesn’t seem very healthy/strong
body: Arrived will as expected, planted, watered then fed a week later and it looks as if it’s on its way out so disappointing:(
Beautiful Rose but plant wasnt as fresh as all my previous ones and a bit dry . Rose also went to a cream colour on three of stems . A lot of buds and it has settled in the garden after feeding
Fabulous new rose. As always, arrived potted in perfect condition. Loads of beautiful flowers. Great addition to my sister’s rose garden.

Patriotic, royalty and very English,
Nice rose colour

The rose arrived it was perfect full of buds
Now in the garden and looking magnificent
Beautiful not stopped flowering since it arrived
Beautiful
Beautiful rose
Good healthy rose with lots of buds
Absolutely beautiful, we are delighted
Stunning rose and lovely floral smell. My favourite 🥰
